About El Taco Real El Taco Real is a Fast Food restaurant located at 935 E Hoffman St in Hammond, IN . El Taco Real has been described as an Amazing Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 9 by our members. Quick Facts

User Reviews for El Taco Real
All Reviews for El Taco Real
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
9
Decor
9
Service
9
There are many imposters on both sides of the river. This is obviously one of them. I would suggest going to the originals like Camp Washington Chili, Blue Ash chili or Price Hill Chili. The food at these joints is still the original and the best around. Do your self a favor and skip the imposters. It's like saying, I will start a pizza joint just like LaRosa's. Good luck with that one. Trust me, stick with the originals. Go and see what I am talking about.
Overall Rating
9
"Amazing"
